children.innerText: te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū adhammaṃ adhammoti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī''ti

innerText: 140 . ''Yeste, bhikkhave, bhikkhū adhammaṃ adhammoti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī''ti [thapentīti (ka.)] . Paṭhamaṃ.

children.innerText: . ''Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū dhammaṃ dhammoti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī''ti. Dutiyaṃ.

innerText: 141 . ''Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū dhammaṃ dhammoti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī''ti. Dutiyaṃ.

children.innerText: . ''Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū avinayaṃ avinayoti dīpenti…pe… vinayaṃ vinayati dīpenti…pe… abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti…pe…
lapitaṃ tathāgatena bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti…pe… anāciṇṇaṃ
tathāgatena anāciṇṇaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti…pe… āciṇṇaṃ tathāgatena āciṇṇaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti…pe…
apaññattaṃ tathāgatena apaññattaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti…pe… Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī''ti. Dasamaṃ.

innerText: 142-149 . ''Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū avinayaṃ avinayoti dīpenti…pe… vinayaṃ vinayati dīpenti…pe… abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti…pe…lapitaṃ tathāgatena bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti…pe… anāciṇṇaṃtathāgatena anāciṇṇaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti…pe… āciṇṇaṃ tathāgatena āciṇṇaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti…pe…apaññattaṃ tathāgatena apaññattaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpenti…pe… Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī''ti. Dasamaṃ.
